hero.subtitle: AUTOS MALL LLC is not just a delivery company. We're a transformation ecosystem that turns workers into entrepreneurs. Every delivery you make brings you one step closer to owning your own logistics business.

opportunity.title: A $177 Billion Market. Your Piece of It.
opportunity.subtitle: The last-mile delivery market will grow to $453 billion by 2035. Those who control it, control the future of commerce. The question is: will you watch from the sidelines or grab your share?

problem.title: Are You Tired of Trading Time for Money?
problem.subtitle: Think about it: You work 40, 50, 60 hours a week. At the end of the month, you have just enough to survive. You're not building wealth. You're not creating a legacy. What if there was another way?
problem.problem1: You work hard but build nothing of your own
problem.problem2: Your income depends 100% on showing up
problem.problem4: Start from zero every single month
problem.solution1: Every delivery builds toward YOUR business
problem.solution3: Mentorship from those who've done it

elevation.title: Your Path to Freedom
elevation.subtitle: We don't create jobs. We create entrepreneurs. Here's exactly how you'll go from driver to business owner.

level1.name: Collaborator
level1.desc: Start earning immediately while learning the business. Flexible hours, optimized routes, assigned mentor.
level1.highlight: You're not an employee. You're a partner in training.

level2.name: Associate
level2.desc: Build your first mini-team. Earn commissions on referrals. Access premium routes and leadership training.
level2.highlight: You're no longer just delivering. You're building a team.

level3.name: Strategic Partner
level3.desc: Run your own operation under our umbrella. Manage vehicles and collaborators. Share in the profits.
level3.highlight: Now you have your own business. We gave you the tools.

level4.name: Independent DSP
level4.desc: Direct contract with carriers. Your own company. Your own fleet. AUTOS MALL as ally, not boss.
level4.highlight: You made it. You own your destiny.

howItWorks.title: How the Transformation Happens
howItWorks.subtitle: Every step is designed to elevate you. Nothing is by accident.

step1.title: Technology-Optimized Routes
step1.desc: Our smart routing system maximizes your on-time delivery and your earnings per hour. You work smarter, not harder.

step2.title: Personalized Mentorship
step2.desc: From day one, we connect you with people who've already walked the path. Real guidance based on real experience.

step3.title: Accelerated Growth
step3.desc: Our system tracks your progress and personalizes your journey. Daily challenges, weekly wins, monthly milestones.

features.title: The Technology Behind Your Success
features.subtitle: We've built an entire ecosystem to ensure you succeed.

tracking.title: Real-Time Everything
tracking.desc: Track your earnings, progress, and path to the next level in real-time. No surprises.

speed.title: Instant Payments
speed.desc: Get paid every Monday via direct deposit. See your earnings accumulate throughout the week.

care.title: Community Support
care.desc: Join a community of ambitious people. Celebrate wins together. Lift each other up.

drivers.title: Professional Training
drivers.desc: Free business training, logistics expertise, and leadership skills. Everything you need to level up.

support.title: 24/7 Assistance
support.desc: Questions at 2 AM? We've got you. Our support team never sleeps.

coverage.title: Growing Territory
coverage.desc: As we expand, your opportunities expand. Texas today. California tomorrow. The country next.

testimonials.title: They Did It. So Can You.
testimonials.subtitle: Real people who transformed their lives through AUTOS MALL.

testimonial1.quote: I came to AUTOS MALL after losing my job in the pandemic. I just wanted to pay bills. Three years later, I have 8 vehicles and a team of 12 people. I earn more than my ex-boss.
testimonial1.name: Maria G.

testimonial2.quote: I used to fix other people's cars 12 hours a day. A friend invited me to AUTOS MALL. I was skeptical. Today I manage 15 drivers and I'm months away from my own DSP.
testimonial2.name: Carlos R.

testimonial3.quote: I needed flexibility for my kids. AUTOS MALL gave me that. But it gave me something more: the vision that I could be more than an employee. Now my kids see their mom building a business.
testimonial3.name: Ana M.

drivers.title: Your Transformation Starts Here
drivers.desc: Stop trading time for money. Start building something of your own. We're looking for ambitious people ready to take control of their financial future.
drivers.urgency: Looking for people committed to their growth

cta.title: The Question Isn't If You Can Do It
cta.subtitle: The question is: Will you try? Every day you wait is a day someone else is building what could be yours.

faq.title: Still Have Doubts?
faq.a1: Absolutely. We're a legally established company in Texas, working to become UniUni partners in the last-mile market. We invite you to meet us, ask questions, and be part of this growth from the beginning.
faq.q2: What if it doesn't work for me?
faq.a2: The system works if you work. We don't promise easy money. We promise that if you put in the effort, you'll have a clear path to something bigger. No contracts tie you down.
faq.q3: I've tried delivery before and it didn't work
faq.a3: The difference is you were alone before. Here you have technology optimizing your routes, a community supporting you, and experienced people guiding you.
faq.q4: Do I need money to invest?
faq.a4: Nothing to start as a Collaborator. Use your current vehicle, earn from day one. Only when you're ready to grow do we talk about investments. Everything is gradual.

finalCta.title: Your Future Is Waiting
finalCta.line2: The question is: will you be in the same place, or will you have built something extraordinary?
finalCta.line3: The decision is yours. The opportunity is here. The time is now.
finalCta.disclaimer: No obligation. No cost to start. Just the first step toward your freedom.

brand.name: AUTOS MALL LLC
brand.description: We don't create jobs. We create business owners. Join the ecosystem that's transforming the last mile—one life at a time.

bottom.copyright: © 2025 AUTOS MALL LLC. All rights reserved.
